messages.subject: Re: funny kid quips
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 5/26/03 8:03:15 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com writes:
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 5/26/03 8:03:15 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com
writes:

<< We are at a stop, and

Evan screams "Mami, mami, a big red "f**k" while pointing in the

general direction of a red head man. >>

Too funny! I'm howling here. :)

A while back our friend's son developed a passion for
the same word. He'd shout it everywhere. His parents
couldn't figure out where he'd picked it up--they blamed
each other, of course. <G> Then one day the dad turned
on the TV and the announcer said, "Coming up next on FOX,"
and the boy shouted, "FOCK!" That's what he was saying
all along.

Lissa in Virginia
